channel.title: slice Examples :: Introduction to Web Dev
channel.description: .slice() Examples The general syntax for this method is: arrayName.slice(starting index, ending index)This method copies a range of elements from one array into a new array. slice does NOT change the original array, but returns a new array. The ending index is optional. If it is left out, slice returns a new array that includes everything from the starting index to the end of the original array.
